channel.title: postgres on Didik Prabowo
channel.description: Recent content in postgres on Didik Prabowo

item.title: Install Postgres
item.description: Install use docker Create file docker compose docker-compose.yml version: "3" services: postgres: image: postgres ports: - "5432:5432" volumes: - ./dbdata:/var/lib/postgresql/data environment: - POSTGRES_PASSWORD=rahas1a network_mode: "bridge" Create folder config and create file postgresql.conf, copy and past file from https://github.com/postgres/postgres/blob/master/src/backend/utils/misc/postgresql.conf.sample docker-compose up
